page.title: 07EDUCATION SCHOOL PRIMARY
page.content: There are 307 children in Kibworth Primary School.The children start at the age of five where they learn to read and write.when they are seven they move up to the junior depart ment.There are 7 junior classes taken by Mrs. Kay and Mrs.Payne,Mrs. Martin and Mrs. Battersby,Mrs.Lloyd,Mrs. Metrick,Mr. Hardwick,Mr.Harding and Mr. Childs.In some cases there are two teachers to a class of about 30 children.Here they improve their skills such as English,maths and topics about History and geography.this school also has a libary open to juniors with a very good selection of books.Mr.Harding is deputy head and Mr.Tunnicliffe is the headmaster.
